channel.title: Traumatic brain injury on Benjamin Gravesteijn
channel.description: Recent content in Traumatic brain injury on Benjamin Gravesteijn

item.title: Chronic traumatic encephalopathy after repeated soccer headings
item.description: This weekend, the NRC, an important Dutch newspaper, published an article concerning the influence of major sports organizations (UEFA, FIFA, AFL) on research concerning chronic traumatic encaphalopathy (CTE). CTE has seen more and more public interest in the last couple of decades. This disease has been described to occur after a career in sports such as soccer, football, or boxing: these are all associated with a substantial amount of repeated mild concussions.
